data.oai_dc:dc: This folder contains three files listed below. 1. DCN_PPI_net.txt: The heterogeneous network file that contains 19,398 nodes (1,538 disease nodes and 17,860 gene nodes) and 1,401,358 edges. Format: UMLS_ID or gene symbol|UMLS_ID or gene symbol|weight. Note: The edge weigh is set to 1.0 since the network is undirected and unweighted.2. disUMLS_name.txt: A disease node mapping file from UMLS ID name to disease concept name . Format: UMLS_ID|disease_name3. AD_novel_genes.csv: A file that contains novel AD risk genes we predicted from DCN_PPI network. Format: Rank,Gene
Alzheimer’s disease|Data mining|disease comorbidity|disease genetics discovery|Systems biology
